page.title: 16Normans Stores in Salterton
page.content: Normans Cash and Carry store is an important part of the shopping facility in Budleigh Salterton.It was founded in 1952 by Mr Norman and has been an increasing busines ever since. Normans buy food from nearly every country in the world.They sell groceries,meat,fruit,clothes and hard ware.Their busiest time is in November when people are stocking up for Christmas.Most people from a fifteen miles radius of Salterton go to Normans about once a week. The Salterton branch is the main one but there are 18 other branches.They do not open on Sundays because it is against the law but they would if they could. 180 people are employed at Normans, including handicapped people.If the Salterton branch closed there would be a lot more unemployed.
